Body:
I want know what service Microsoft Azure can provide to visualize and manage data of and IoT project.

Currently, I did a connection between an IoTHub and Power BI Service, through an Stream Analytics Job. IoThub is the service where the messages sent by the devices arrives to an endpoint, to be read later by the stream analytics job that send the telemetry to powerbi. Also I found a service called thingsboard that can be an option but I want to know what other options exist.

The real-time module of power bi is not very good and isn't customizable. I need a service where I can do more things:

-Create multiaxis graphics

-Zoom on graphics

-Query different periods of time

-Store data for minimum one year (Optional)

-Create alerts and alarms when data exceeds a threshold

-Create advanced alerts and alarms(example: the sum of two variables exceeds a threshold for two minutes)

-Export data(csv,xlsx,pdf, etc)

Hi Andres. Did you take a look at [Time Series Insights?](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/time-series-insights/). Also see [Azure IoT Reference Architecture](https://aka.ms/iotrefarchitecture)

You can look at Time Series Insights. Also see Azure IoT Reference Architecture

"
